item.title: Neeeeeeeeeeed heeelp!
item.dc:creator: @kennkennk kennkennk
item.description:
@kennkennk wrote:

I need help with that everyone can spawn except a few items like Pvp drops, pkpshops,dontor shop items…

This is what i got soo far…

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”))
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
/**
* @param newItemID The Id for the Item you want
* @param newItemAmount The amount of the Item you would like
/
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
/
* != Means not equal to.
* #### Is the item Id’s you don’t wan’t spawnable.
*/
if ((newItemID != 14484 || (newItemID != 14642) || (newItemID != 14641) ||

(newItemID != 11728) || (newItemID != 15328) || (newItemID != 15332) || (newItemID != 20135) || (newItemID != 20139) || (newItemID != 20143) || (newItemID

!= 13738) || (newItemID != 13740) || (newItemID != 13742) || (newItemID != 13743) || (newItemID != 15084) || (newItemID != 15088) || (newItemID != 15098) ||

(newItemID != 18349) || (newItemID != 18351) || (newItemID != 18355) || (newItemID != 18353) || (newItemID != 20151) || (newItemID != 18357) || (newItemID

!= 18359) || (newItemID != 20147) || (newItemID != 20155) || (newItemID != 20159) || (newItemID != 20163) || (newItemID != 20167) || (newItemID != 1050)) ) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

					}[/code]

I accept Team Viewer help

Read full topic
